A bridge made famous by the Winnie the Pooh stories has sold for more than £131,000 at auction.

articles.title: Famous 'two Beatles' £105m mansion where John Lennon played 'Imagine' is being extended - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan of the UAE is seeking planning permission to extend his luxury Berkshire property Tittenhurst Park which was once owned by John Lennon and Ringo Starr.
articles.content:
A mansion once owned by John Lennon before he sold it to Ringo Starr is being extended to accommodate guests of a Middle Eastern royal family.
